name: Short Story: Isolation
description: This is a short RPG experience. The game is only about 3 hours long, but in that time you will have an epic adventure. This game has a full storyline with memorable characters. Many engaging quests. Fight bosses and complete the main quest! Improve your character and loot for the best weapons. This game does not have in-app purchases, timers, or unnecessary grind. Buy it and play it as a full, unhindered experience. Game is available for iOS and Apple TV. Supports all kinds of controllers.
